entry.title: Encrypted Wallet Backward Compatibility
entry.summary: In an email thread from 2011, Gavin Andresen expressed his opinion on the necessity of certain code pulls. He stated that he did not believe that version 0.3.24 required either of these pulls. Additionally, he noted that fixing downgrade-to-0.3.24 was not a high priority item on the to-do list. While some may disagree with his perspective, he ultimately agreed that version 0.3.24 would be used. The email also included a non-text attachment named signature.asc, which was a digitally signed message part.
